name: Chicken Powser
description:
A fun little game for kids to imagine helping out in the kitchen! See if you can use the sponge, soap, and faucet to help clean the pots in the sink. Or try to fit all the dishes in the dishwasher and see them sparkle and gleam. Enjoy the delightful music as you help with chores.

Chicken Powder is named after the tiny chick who's fluffy cuteness appears on the cleaning powder label. In real life, the powder is just made of limestone, no chickens were harmed!

Game design and art by Emmeline Beck

Game programming by Bill Beck & Emmeline Beck

Music by Nia
